name: Introduction to Art History
description: An introduction to the history of art from prehistoric times to the present day.

name: Survey of Medieval Art
description: A survey of the art of the Middle Ages, from its inception to the end of the Gothic period.

name: Early Medieval Art
description: A study of the art of Early Medieval Europe (500-1000 CE) with an emphasis on the Carolingian, Ottonian, and Romanesque periods.

name: High Medieval Art
description: A study of the art of the High Middle Ages (1000-1300 CE), focusing on Gothic art in Europe.

name: Late Medieval Art
description: A study of the art of the Late Middle Ages (1300-1500 CE), focusing on the International Gothic and Renaissance styles.
